sentences.en: Cab driver : For twenty dollars I'll take you to a Ku Klux Klan cookout!
sentences.cn: 占士邦: 那麽若你跟著那架房车后面的话,我会给你多二十元.

sentences.en: Gimi: Sounds like a plan . [ to Holly ] Will I see you at the cookout?
sentences.cn: 吉米: 听来不错. ( 对荷莉)我会在野炊时见到你 吗 ?

sentences.en: I've been invited to a cookout this weekend.
sentences.cn: 我这周末已经被邀去参加野炊.

sentences.en: Why don't you guys come a cookout on Friday night?
sentences.cn: 你们星期五晚上何不去野炊?

trans.tran_en: a party or occasion when a meal is cooked and eaten outdoors
